channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3540] Secret copyright treaty leaks. It's bad. Very bad.
item.description: The internet chapter of the Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement, a secret copyright treaty whose text Obama's administration refused to disclose due to "national security" concerns, has leaked. It's bad.

item.title: [+3427] Today I hired a new designer, this is how we set him up ....
[+2043] Colorado ski town legalizes pot
item.description: The Colorado ski town of Breckenridge has voted overwhelmingly to legalize marijuana.

item.title: [+1453] Today's Google Logo is AWESOME! [PIC]
[+1445] I found "Where the Wild Things Are." On a train!!
[+1432] IRL Big Head mode- think Goldeneye.
item.description: This man's Halloween costume/project: Great or greatest?

item.title: [+1276] Wallace and Gromit Google logo
item.description: Google celebrate the 20th anniversary of Wallace and Gromit

item.title: [+1242] Got HDTV? Get Ready For UHD-TV
item.description: UHD will come in two resolution levels: 7680 x 4320 pixels (8K) and 3840 x 2160 pixels (4K) and provide four to 16 times the resolution of Blu-ray or 1080p high-def, along with "22.2 multichannel three-dimensional sound." What next, a real holodeck?

item.description: This'll come in handy next time I play D & D with Niko Bellic.

item.title: [+935] Woman calls police because daughter was better at oral sex
item.description: A humiliated wife phoned cops to moan that her daughter gave her husband oral sex â€“ and was better at it.

item.title: [+846] October 2009 browser stats: Firefox finally passes IE6
item.description: Internet Explorer 6 has finally been surpassed by Firefox according to the latest worldwide market share numbers. Details inside.

item.title: [+719] Maine Says No to Same-Sex Marriage, Yes to Pot
item.description: So I guess the folks up in Maine like taking away people's rights to get married - but damn if they tell them they can't smoke pot!

item.title: [+678] One Response to Neighbors' Over-the-Top Christmas Lights
item.description: Now they probably won't be invited to the neighbors' over-the-top Christmas party either...

item.title: [+617] When a story I dugg becomes popular...NEW! (Or Annoying)
item.description: The story you Dugg, Who_Freakin_Cares,has become popular, and your Digg helped it get there. See who elsedugg and commented on this story by clicking on the story title. Thanks!

item.title: [+608] Louisiana justice who refused interracial marriage resigns
item.description: A Louisiana justice of the peace who drew criticism for refusing to issue a marriage license to an interracial couple has resigned, the secretary of state's office said Tuesday.

item.title: [+603] Israeli Commandos Seize Hezbollah-Bound Arms Ship
item.description: Israeli commandos seized a ship Wednesday that defense officials said was carrying hundreds of tons of weapons from Iran bound for...

item.title: [+598] Not a good idea to masturbate to porn in the police station
item.description: It gets worse. It was child pr0n and they guy is a cop. Police Officer Alan C. Vigiard, 45, was arrested last week and charged with possession of child pornography. The digital evidence unit also found that "Lime Wire" had been installed on the evidence room computer.

item.title: [+581] Blockbuster employee stabs himself so he could skip work
item.description: At about 6:30 p.m. on Monday night, Aaron Siebers reported that he'd been stabbed in Edgewater by "three skinheads or Hispanic males dressed in black" who tried to rob him. Trouble is, a surveillance video from a business where this alleged attack supposedly took place didn't show anything like what Siebers described.

item.title: [+570] Always Set Your Parking Brake (Video)
item.description: Blame it on me!! Your truck just might try to get away if you don't.
